TEXT.English: An elemental was summoned in your city!
TEXT.French: An elemental was summoned in your city!
TEXT.German: An elemental was summoned in your city!
TEXT.Italian: An elemental was summoned in your city!
TEXT.Spanish: An elemental was summoned in your city!

TEXT.English: You can fight the elements. But you can't really win, you know.
TEXT.French: You can fight the elements. But you can't really win, you know.
TEXT.German: You can fight the elements. But you can't really win, you know.
TEXT.Italian: You can fight the elements. But you can't really win, you know.
TEXT.Spanish: You can fight the elements. But you can't really win, you know.

TEXT.English: This world is loosing balance. You are responsible, be it with action, or lack of it whan it was a natural thing to act.
TEXT.French: This world is loosing balance. You are responsible, be it with action, or lack of it whan it was a natural thing to act.
TEXT.German: This world is loosing balance. You are responsible, be it with action, or lack of it whan it was a natural thing to act.
TEXT.Italian: This world is loosing balance. You are responsible, be it with action, or lack of it whan it was a natural thing to act.
TEXT.Spanish: This world is loosing balance. You are responsible, be it with action, or lack of it whan it was a natural thing to act.
